document.full_text: many young people have never worn a watch. and while new versions alert them to messages on their smartphones, it's unknown whether that will give them reason enough to buy one.
document.title: digital domain: the wristwatch is reimagined. will young shoppers care?
lines_and_colors: many young people have never worn a watch. and while new versions alert them to messages on their smartphones, it's unknown whether that will give them reason enough to buy one.
